messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] : Harry Potter Club for
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Carol and Linda et al, My 14 DD is going to start a HP story-sharing list.  When she gets it up and running, I will let you all know.  They (my DD s) got
messages.messageBody:
Hi Carol and Linda et al,
My 14 DD is going to start a HP story-sharing list. When she gets it up and
running, I will let you all know. They (my DD's) got fairly excited when I
told them about it! And they are anxious to start it, so it won't be long
I'm sure!
Kim

> From: Carol Burke <Burkfamily9@...>
> Subject: Re: RE: Harry Potter Club for unschoolers 10-13 yrs. old
>
> Hi-
> My 13yog and 11 and 9yob would be very interested in a
> Harry Potter story sharing group. Thanks for sharing
> the role playing group.
> Let us know the details or if we can help start a
> group.
>
> Thanks.
> Carol B.
>
